overview: She has an elegant hat, bad English (she came from Russia after all), an unaffordable suitcase with the most necessary things. She has no home, relatives, friends, work, elementary concepts about the life into which she has been brought, and which she will never be able to arrange. A Russian girl who got lost in three New York skyscrapers and already managed to get into someone's tenacious hands finds friendship and understanding from the same outcast and restless Negro janitor...
title: Black and White
